name: Sarkar-MD
description: Best Whatsapp bot made by Bandaheali

SESSION_ID.description: Paste here session ID that you have scanned

MODE.description: Enter 'true' for public mode, 'no' for private mode

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the owner's phone number with country code (e.g., +1234567890)

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enter 'true' for autoview status, 'no' to disable

AUTO_READ.description: Enter 'true' for autoread messages, 'no' to disable

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enter 'true' for auto typing, 'no' to disable

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enter 'true' to show recording audio, 'no' to disable

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Enter 'true' to show the bot as always online, 'no' to disable

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enter 'true' to auto-block numbers starting with 212, 'no' to disable

REJECT_CALL.description: Enter 'true' to reject calls, 'no' to disable
